modName: Telvanni Robes Fix Revert For Unofficial Skyrim Patch
summary: This small mod reverts a fix done by USLEEP that made the Telvanni Robes (dropped by Ildari Sarothril, appears in the quest "Old Friends") not appear when she is killed. This mod adds the robes into her inventory on death, as well as the Telvanni Shoes (previously unobtainable, only worn by Neloth), so the full set is obtainable from her du
descriptionHtml:
This small mod reverts a fix done by USLEEP (version 2.0.9+) Â that made the Telvanni Robes (dropped by Ildari Sarothril, appears in the quest "Old Friends") not appear as loot when she is killed. This mod adds the robes into her inventory on death, as well as the Telvanni Shoes (previously unobtainable, only worn by Neloth), so the full set is obtainable from her during the related quest.

Also fixes bug with the robes that caused the heartstone harness to appear on female version of the robes she originally dropped in Vanilla.


[b]
Requires: Dragonborn DLC[/b]


[b]Make sure to load after USLEEP in your Mod load order.[/b]
author: solstrom7

files.name: Telvanni Robes Fix Revert For USLEEP
